001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005import java.io.InputStreamReader;
006import java.io.LineNumberReader;
007import java.io.Reader;
008import java.io.StringReader;
009import java.io.StringWriter;
010import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
011import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
012import java.nio.CharBuffer;
013import java.nio.charset.Charset;
014import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
015import java.util.BitSet;
016import java.util.Collections;
017import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
018import java.util.Map;
019import java.util.Objects;
020import java.util.Properties;
021import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger;
022import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
023
024import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
025
026/**
027 * Writes and parses properties.
028 */
029public final class PropertiesParser {
030
031        private PropertiesParser() {
032        }
033
034        /**
035         * Writes properties.
036         * @param map properties map.
037         * @return properties as a string.
038         */
039        public static String writeProperties(Map<String, String> map) {
040                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
041                try {
042                        writeProperties(map, sb);
043                }
044                catch (IOException e) {
045                        throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
046                }
047                return sb.toString();
048
049        }
050
051        /**
052         * Read properties.
053         * @param input from.
054         * @return properties as a map.
055         */
056        public static Map<String, String> readProperties(String input) {
057                Map<String, String> m = new LinkedHashMap<>();
058                StringReader sr = new StringReader(input);
059                try {
060                        readProperties(sr, m::put);
061                }
062                catch (IOException e) {
063                        throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
064                }
065                return m;
066        }
067
068        /**
069         * Read properties.
070         * @param reader from
071         * @param consumer to
072         * @throws IOException on read failue
073         */
074        static void readProperties(Reader reader, BiConsumer<String, String> consumer) throws IOException {
075                Properties bp = prepareProperties(consumer);
076                bp.load(reader);
077
078        }
079
080        @SuppressWarnings({ "serial" })
081        static void writeProperties(Map<String, String> map, Appendable sb) throws IOException {
082                StringWriter sw = new StringWriter();
083                new Properties() {
084                        @Override
085                        @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "rawtypes" })
086                        public java.util.Enumeration keys() {
087                                return Collections.enumeration(map.keySet());
088                        }
089
090                        @Override
091                        @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "rawtypes" })
092                        public java.util.Set entrySet() {
093                                return map.entrySet();
094                        }
095
096                        @SuppressWarnings({ "nullness" }) // checker bug
097                        @Override
098                        public @Nullable Object get(Object key) {
099                                return map.get(key);
100                        }
101                }.store(sw, null);
102                LineNumberReader lr = new LineNumberReader(new StringReader(sw.toString()));
103
104                String line;
105                while ((line = lr.readLine()) != null) {
106                        if (!line.startsWith("#")) {
107                                sb.append(line).append(System.lineSeparator());
108                        }
109                }
110        }
111
112        enum PropertiesFormat {
113
114                PROPERTIES, XML
115
116        }
117
118        static Map<String, String> readProperties(InputStream s) throws IOException {
119                return readProperties(s, PropertiesFormat.PROPERTIES);
120        }
121
122        private static Map<String, String> readProperties(InputStream s, PropertiesFormat format) throws IOException {
123                final Map<String, String> ordered = new LinkedHashMap<>();
124
125                try {
126                        switch (format) {
127                                case PROPERTIES: {
128                                        LineNumberReader lr = new LineNumberReader(new InputStreamReader(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
129                                        Properties bp = prepareProperties((k, v) -> {
130                                                if (ordered.containsKey(k)) {
131                                                        throw new DuplicateKeyException(k, lr.getLineNumber());
132                                                }
133                                                ordered.put(k, v);
134                                        });
135                                        bp.load(lr);
136                                        break;
137                                }
138                                case XML: {
139                                        AtomicInteger i = new AtomicInteger();
140                                        Properties bp = prepareProperties((k, v) -> {
141                                                i.incrementAndGet();
142                                                if (ordered.containsKey(k)) {
143                                                        throw new DuplicateKeyException(k, i.get());
144                                                }
145                                                ordered.put(k, v);
146                                        });
147                                        bp.loadFromXML(s);
148                                        break;
149                                }
150                        }
151                        return ordered;
152                }
153                catch (DuplicateKeyException e) {
154                        throw new IOException("Duplicate key detected. key: '" + e.key + "' line: " + e.lineNumber, e);
155                }
156        }
157
158        private static Properties prepareProperties(BiConsumer<String, String> consumer) throws IOException {
159
160                // Hack to use properties class to load but our map for preserved order
161                @SuppressWarnings({ "serial", "nullness" })
162                Properties bp = new Properties() {
163                        @Override
164                        @SuppressWarnings({ "nullness", "keyfor" }) // checker bug
165                        public @Nullable Object put(Object key, Object value) {
166                                Objects.requireNonNull(key);
167                                Objects.requireNonNull(value);
168                                consumer.accept((String) key, (String) value);
169                                return null;
170                        }
171                };
172                return bp;
173        }
174
175        static class DuplicateKeyException extends RuntimeException {
176
177                private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
178
179                final String key;
180
181                final int lineNumber;
182
183                public DuplicateKeyException(String key, int lineNumber) {
184                        super("Duplicate key detected. key: '" + key + "' line: " + lineNumber);
185                        this.key = key;
186                        this.lineNumber = lineNumber;
187                }
188
189        }
190
191}
192
193final class PercentCodec {
194
195        static final BitSet GEN_DELIMS = new BitSet(256);
196        static final BitSet SUB_DELIMS = new BitSet(256);
197        static final BitSet UNRESERVED = new BitSet(256);
198        static final BitSet URIC = new BitSet(256);
199
200        static {
201                GEN_DELIMS.set(':');
202                GEN_DELIMS.set('/');
203                GEN_DELIMS.set('?');
204                GEN_DELIMS.set('#');
205                GEN_DELIMS.set('[');
206                GEN_DELIMS.set(']');
207                GEN_DELIMS.set('@');
208
209                SUB_DELIMS.set('!');
210                SUB_DELIMS.set('$');
211                SUB_DELIMS.set('&');
212                SUB_DELIMS.set('\'');
213                SUB_DELIMS.set('(');
214                SUB_DELIMS.set(')');
215                SUB_DELIMS.set('*');
216                SUB_DELIMS.set('+');
217                SUB_DELIMS.set(',');
218                SUB_DELIMS.set(';');
219                SUB_DELIMS.set('=');
220
221                for (int i = 'a'; i <= 'z'; i++) {
222                        UNRESERVED.set(i);
223                }
224                for (int i = 'A'; i <= 'Z'; i++) {
225                        UNRESERVED.set(i);
226                }
227                // numeric characters
228                for (int i = '0'; i <= '9'; i++) {
229                        UNRESERVED.set(i);
230                }
231                UNRESERVED.set('-');
232                UNRESERVED.set('.');
233                UNRESERVED.set('_');
234                UNRESERVED.set('~');
235                URIC.or(SUB_DELIMS);
236                URIC.or(UNRESERVED);
237        }
238
239        private static final int RADIX = 16;
240
241        static void encode(final StringBuilder buf, final CharSequence content, final @Nullable Charset charset,
242                        final BitSet safechars, final boolean blankAsPlus) {
243                final CharBuffer cb = CharBuffer.wrap(content);
244                final ByteBuffer bb = (charset != null ? charset : StandardCharsets.UTF_8).encode(cb);
245                while (bb.hasRemaining()) {
246                        final int b = bb.get() & 0xff;
247                        if (safechars.get(b)) {
248                                buf.append((char) b);
249                        }
250                        else if (blankAsPlus && b == ' ') {
251                                buf.append("+");
252                        }
253                        else {
254                                buf.append("%");
255                                final char hex1 = Character.toUpperCase(Character.forDigit((b >> 4) & 0xF, RADIX));
256                                final char hex2 = Character.toUpperCase(Character.forDigit(b & 0xF, RADIX));
257                                buf.append(hex1);
258                                buf.append(hex2);
259                        }
260                }
261        }
262
263        static void encode(final StringBuilder buf, final CharSequence content, final Charset charset,
264                        final boolean blankAsPlus) {
265                encode(buf, content, charset, UNRESERVED, blankAsPlus);
266        }
267
268        public static void encode(final StringBuilder buf, final CharSequence content, final Charset charset) {
269                encode(buf, content, charset, UNRESERVED, false);
270        }
271
272        public static String encode(final CharSequence content, final Charset charset) {
273
274                final StringBuilder buf = new StringBuilder();
275                encode(buf, content, charset, UNRESERVED, false);
276                return buf.toString();
277        }
278
279        static String decode(final CharSequence content, final @Nullable Charset charset, final boolean plusAsBlank) {
280                final ByteBuffer bb = ByteBuffer.allocate(content.length());
281                final CharBuffer cb = CharBuffer.wrap(content);
282                while (cb.hasRemaining()) {
283                        final char c = cb.get();
284                        if (c == '%' && cb.remaining() >= 2) {
285                                final char uc = cb.get();
286                                final char lc = cb.get();
287                                final int u = Character.digit(uc, RADIX);
288                                final int l = Character.digit(lc, RADIX);
289                                if (u != -1 && l != -1) {
290                                        bb.put((byte) ((u << 4) + l));
291                                }
292                                else {
293                                        bb.put((byte) '%');
294                                        bb.put((byte) uc);
295                                        bb.put((byte) lc);
296                                }
297                        }
298                        else if (plusAsBlank && c == '+') {
299                                bb.put((byte) ' ');
300                        }
301                        else {
302                                bb.put((byte) c);
303                        }
304                }
305                bb.flip();
306                return (charset != null ? charset : StandardCharsets.UTF_8).decode(bb).toString();
307        }
308
309        public static String decode(final CharSequence content, final Charset charset) {
310                return decode(content, charset, false);
311        }
312
313}
